channel.title: Yellow's Antenna Solution?
channel.description:
Any more info available on the yellow's antenna solutions(s)/implementation ??
Yellow datasheet says cellular, GPS, wifi, BT antennas all integrated. Yet the latest pictures seem to show a single Fractus FR01-S4-224 antenna on top and 3 U.FL connectors on bottom (labeled main, Div, GPS).
And am wondering what the efficiency of the on-board cellular antenna will be in the low freq LTE bands (700 MHz) with the small GND plane of the yellow. (100mm length is recommended by Fractus but yellow is only 65mm)

item.title: Yellow's Antenna Solution?
item.dc:creator: Carles
item.description:
Here is another one, that shows how to tune the frequency range using a matching network synthesizer software such as Cadence AWR, Optenni or alike:

microwavejournal.com

Optimizing Wireless Connectivity with Embedded Antennas

To ensure a fast and economic development of the new generation of IoT devices, module and chip makers have created a number of prototyping kits, developing platforms and reference designs that makes sure that any IoT engineer has everything ready to...

Does this help?

Read full topic

item.title: Yellow's Antenna Solution?
item.dc:creator: Carles
item.description:
Hi bseng,

To tune the chip antenna at mangOH Yellow to other frequency ranges and optimize the performance on your board, you might find these references useful:

www.mwee.com – 20 Sep 19

Virtual Antenna™ for easy design of IoT devices with embedded antennas

Virtual Antenna™ technology enables one antenna component to cover all IoT frequency bands. This article describes the main features of Virtual Antenna™ technology and shows a simple design flow comprising only three simple steps.

Read full topic

item.title: Yellow's Antenna Solution?
item.dc:creator: Carles
item.description:
Hi bseng,

Happy to help optimizing the antenna in your IoT design. Please notice that mangOH Yellow is a demonstration platform and that the performance of the embedded RUN mXTEND cellular IoT antenna can be substantially optimized in your final design.

The fastest and easiest way to get that done is through NN’s Wireless Fast Track Service. You can get an easy access to it through FRACTUS ANTENNAS website:

Fractus Antennas

Fast Track Project - Fractus Antennas

1. Fill out the form and submit it. Get confirmation email.2. Reply to email. If you wish, attach any relevant design file.3. Get your free design in 24h.   Wireless Fast-Track Service Pack – NN-S-1.0 Deliverable Antenna Placement + Initial...

Please tell us about your project there (e.g. target frequencies, board size, clearance etc.) and we’ll hand you out an optimization of the RUN mXTEND antenna in your device in 24h. Free of charge (*).

Cheers!

Carles

() free of charge service subject to terms and conditions.*

Read full topic

item.title: Yellow's Antenna Solution?
item.dc:creator: asyal
item.description:
Hi,

We provide ufl antenna for all the on board wireless (cellular, wifi, bt, gps, and NFC).
We also provide on board antenna for all the above. But note the cellular antenna is only for developmental purposes as the board size is not big enough.
For the rest, there is no real restriction due to board size.

regards,
Ashish

Read full topic
